tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Doctor had no time for new patients... No proper assistant nurse or junior doctors for such a experienced doctor . Fully wasted our day 1 full day, even when they knew doctor was busy with other cases in Chandrama Sagar hospital.  
And finally when doctor was available after 4- 5 hours of waiting.  Instead of providing proper advice. Doctor made us feel embarrassed of my sickness. Spoke rudely wether you want kids or not. *** *** ********* ** ********* **** ********* **** ***** ****** ***** *** ******* ** *** ****** ** ** **** ************* *** ***** **** **** ** **** **** * ****** ************  Very disrespectful experience.
reply_text:
I am sorry for ur disrespectful experience. We at sagar there r 3 fellow doctors , 1 assitant doctor, apart from 3 staff nures, cordinator and receptionist, unfortunately when ur appiontment was there few were on leave. As far staff is considered it is immaterial for u, as long as u get the right treatment. As said by u , experienced doctor like me  wud have adviced same as what i have. If someone other doctor has adviced differently, that is not strange. 2nd opinion is always there in medical feild. But with 12 years of experience, what has to be adiviced in ur cases, that is ethical and correct has been put across to u. 1 to 2 hrs of waiting happens on saturday morning OPD, if it gets entangled with emergencies. 
No one can understand the emtional tormoil the childlesscouple go through better than the treating fertility doctor.
 I can only pray god to get out of ur furstrations and negativty towards life . Mental health is very important. Take care of it.Wishing u sucess in ur path.
Sorry once again .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are truly blessed to meet Dr. Rashmi Swaroop in our life. 

When I had almost lost my hope of conceiving a child, she gave me good confidence that I can conceive, which became true in the same month I consulted her. 

She's God sent person to us. 

We are grateful to her throughout our life. 

Though she's a great specialist in her profession, she is very simple, friendly, and always smiling. 

With her treatment, we are blessed with a girl child. 

Thanks a ton to Dr. Rashmi Swaroop for such a wonderful gift.
